resources.string: This speed, distance and time formula helps in analyzing the movement of an object. Try it now!
Distance: %1$s km\nSpeed: %2$s km/h\nRequired travel time: %3$.2f hour

This image shows an illustration of a car moving from point A to point B along a straight path. In addition, there is a clock icon that shows the travel time. 
- The clock shows the travel time used by the car to change position. 
- A car moving from A to B shows that the vehicle has traveled a certain distance. 
- By knowing the distance and time, we can calculate the speed using the formula below.
Speed = Distance/Time\nDistance = Speed x Time\nTime = Distance/Speed
